caption.title: Overview of AAL regions of significantly modulated resting-state low and high gamma-band power.

tr.td: left Calcarine Fissure, left Inferior Occipital Gyrus
right and left Superior Medial Frontal Gyrus, right Middle Frontal Gyrus

right and left Superior Medial Frontal Gyrus, right Middle Frontal Gyrus, left Inferior Parietal Lobule, left Superior Orbital Frontal Gyrus, left Superior Temporal Gyrus, left PostCentral Gyrus, right PreCentral Gyrus
left Middle Occipital Gyrus, right and left Middle Frontal Gyrus, left Angular Gyrus, left Inferior Parietal Lobule
left Middle Frontal Gyrus, left Middle Occipital Gyrus
right and left Middle Occipital Gyrus, right and left Middle Frontal Gyrus. left Angular Gyrus, right Inferior Parietal Lobule, left Superior Medial Frontal Gyrus
right and left Calcarine Fissure, right and left Inferior Occipital Gyrus, right and left Middle Occipital Gyrus,right and left PreCuneus, left Inferior Frontal Gyrus,left Angular Gyrus
right and left Superior Medial Frontal Gyrus, left Superior Orbital Frontal Gyrus, left Middle Orbital Frontal Gyrus, left PostCentral Gyrus

fn.p: *Non-parametric Monte-Carlo permutation based independent-sample tests, alpha-level 0.05, two-sided, FDR corrected voxels.
